Speaker: Affecto
Text: I understand how unsettling this must be for you, Alex. A positive FOBT result means that some blood was found in your stool, but this doesn’t automatically mean something serious. It could be caused by several things, many of which are treatable. The next step, a colonoscopy, will help us figure it out. You’re taking an important step toward understanding what’s happening, and that’s a good thing.

Speaker: Affecto
Text: It is completely natural to feel worried, Alex, but I want to reassure you that a positive FOBT doesn’t necessarily mean cancer. There are a lot of other causes, like polyps or inflammation, which are often manageable. The colonoscopy will give your doctors a clear picture, and whatever it is, catching it early is the best thing you can do. You’re already taking control of your health, and that’s something to feel good about.
